testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Carson
items.comment: WaveSpeed’s moderation tool saved us from potential backlash by filtering harmful comments instantly!

items.name: Raj Patel
items.comment: As a community manager, I appreciate how fast and accurate the moderation is. It allows me to focus on engagement.

items.name: Linda Brown
items.comment: The AI's ability to identify subtle issues is impressive. I feel more confident in managing our online space.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your questions about our content moderation feature

items.title: What types of content can be moderated?
items.description: Our AI can identify and filter various types of inappropriate content, including hate speech, explicit imagery, and harmful messages, ensuring a safe digital environment.

items.title: Is there a charge for using the content moderation feature?
items.description: Absolutely! Your initial setup provides access to moderate 30 pieces of content daily, which is completely free. Additional credits and premium features are available for our subscription users.

items.title: Can I customize the moderation criteria?
items.description: Yes, you can set specific criteria for moderation based on your unique requirements and community guidelines, giving you full control over the content.

items.title: How does privacy protection work?
items.description: All moderation is performed instantly on your device, with no content uploaded to external servers, ensuring your data remains confidential and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Content Safety?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the power of automated content moderation. No sign-up needed.
